remarks: The predicate "is a lattice line" in terms of atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-2012.)
statement:
islln2a.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
islln2a.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
islln2a.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
islln2a $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( ( P .\/ Q ) e. N <-> P =/= Q ) ) $.
